description:
A Priest Statue goes around a village.  A Priest Statue turns sideways. An unsettling story about a teacup.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mawari Jizou / Yokomuki Jizou / Chawan no Naka
The Priest Statue That Goes Round / The Priest Statue That Faced Sideways / Inside the Teacup
まわり地蔵 / 横向き地蔵 / 茶碗の中
